description: NASA-style interactive universe explorer with massive galaxy expansion pack.

objects.name: Sun
objects.description: The Sun is the massive star at the center of our solar system.

objects.name: Earth
objects.description: Earth is the only known planet to support life.

objects.name: Moon
objects.description: The Moon controls tides and stabilizes Earth's rotation.

objects.name: Milky Way
objects.description: Our home galaxy containing hundreds of billions of stars.

objects.name: Triangulum Galaxy 1
